files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.CustomModelData.Targets
files.Summary: A class with some common target names

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.CustomModelData
files.Summary: Custom Model data that Nautilus will use to apply custom looks to certain prefabs.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.CustomPrefab
files.Summary: Represents a class with everything needed to make a custom prefab work.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.CustomPrefabExtensions
files.Summary: Represents extension methods for the <xref href="Nautilus.Assets.CustomPrefab" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> class.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.Gadgets.CraftingGadget
files.Summary: Represents a crafting gadget

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.Gadgets.DuplicateGadgetException
files.Summary: The exception that is thrown when a <xref href="Nautilus.Assets.Gadgets.Gadget" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> is attempted to be added when an existing one of the same type already exists.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.Gadgets.EggGadget
files.Summary: Represents a creature egg gadget.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.Gadgets.EquipmentGadget
files.Summary: Represents an equipment gadget

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.Gadgets.FabricatorGadget
files.Summary: Represents a craft tree/fabricator gadget.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.Gadgets.Gadget
files.Summary: Represents a class that handles registers to game code.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.Gadgets.GadgetExtensions
files.Summary: Represents extension methods for the <xref href="Nautilus.Assets.Gadgets.Gadget" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> class.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.Gadgets.ScanningGadget.SortPosition
files.Summary: Defines the insertion position for the new blueprint in relation to the <xref href="Nautilus.Assets.Gadgets.ScanningGadget.PdaSortTarget" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> in the PDA.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.Gadgets.ScanningGadget
files.Summary: Represents a scanning gadget.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.Gadgets.UpgradeModuleGadget
files.Summary: Represents a vehicle upgrade module gadget.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.ICustomPrefab
files.Summary: Specifies the contract for a custom prefab.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.ModPrefabCache
files.Summary:
Class used by the prefab system to store GameObjects.
Objects in the cache are inactive because they are placed within an inactive parent object.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.PrefabFactoryAsync
files.Summary: A delegate for prefab construction used by Nautilus to create game objects dynamically.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.PrefabInfo
files.Summary: Data class that represents information about a prefab.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.PrefabPostProcessorAsync
files.Summary: Delegate used for Nautilus's prefab post processing event to modify the processed prefab via a dynamic method.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.PrefabTemplates.AssetBundleTemplate
files.Summary: A PrefabTemplate used for loading objects in from asset bundles

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.PrefabTemplates.AtmosphereVolumeTemplate.VolumeShape
files.Summary: The shape of an atmosphere volume's trigger.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.PrefabTemplates.AtmosphereVolumeTemplate
files.Summary: A template for Atmosphere Volumes, which are basic invisible triggers for mini-biomes. Atmosphere volumes can affect fog, music, ambient sounds and even the player's swim speed.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.PrefabTemplates.CloneTemplate
files.Summary: Represents a prefab clone template.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.PrefabTemplates.EggTemplate
files.Summary: Represents a creature egg prefab template.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.PrefabTemplates.EnergySourceTemplate
files.Summary: Represents an energy source template. This template is capable of returning a Battery or a Power Cell.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.PrefabTemplates.FabricatorTemplate.Model
files.Summary: Defines a list of available models for your custom fabricator.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.PrefabTemplates.FabricatorTemplate
files.Summary: Represents an fabricator template. This template is capable of returning a Fabricator or a Workbench.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.PrefabTemplates.PrefabTemplate
files.Summary: Represents the contract for a prefab template.

files.Title: Nautilus.Assets.SpawnLocation
files.Summary: Defines the spawn location with world position and optional euler angles. Used in the Coordinated Spawns system.

files.Title: Nautilus.Commands.ConsoleCommandAttribute
files.Summary:
Attribute used to signify the decorated method should be called in response to a console command.

Decorated method must be both public and static.

files.Title: Nautilus.Crafting.ModCraftTreeCraft
files.Summary: A crafting node of a CraftTree. This is the last node on a tree; The one that actually crafts something.

files.Title: Nautilus.Crafting.ModCraftTreeLinkingNode
files.Summary: Abstract class that provides methods for adding new nodes into the crafting tree.

files.Title: Nautilus.Crafting.ModCraftTreeNode
files.Summary: Basic data structure of a crafting tree node.

files.Title: Nautilus.Crafting.ModCraftTreeRoot
files.Summary:
The root node of a CraftTree. The whole tree starts here.

Build up your custom crafting tree from this root node using the AddCraftingNode and AddTabNode methods.
This tree will be automatically patched into the game.

For more advanced usage, you can replace the default value of with your own custom function.

files.Title: Nautilus.Crafting.ModCraftTreeTab
files.Summary: A tab node of a CraftTree. Tab nodes help organize crafting nodes by grouping them into categories.

files.Title: Nautilus.Crafting.RecipeData
files.Summary: A class that fully describes a recipe for a <xref href="TechType" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> identified item.

files.Title: Nautilus.Extensions.FModExtensions
files.Summary: Contains extension methods for the FMOD system.

files.Title: Nautilus.Extensions.GameObjectExtensions
files.Summary: Contains extension methods for Unity objects.

files.Title: Nautilus.Extensions.GeneralExtensions
files.Summary: Contains extensions that are not exclusively specific to one type.

files.Title: Nautilus.Extensions.RecipeExtensions
files.Summary: Contains extensions that are specific to the <xref href="Nautilus.Crafting.RecipeData" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> and <xref href="ITechData" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> classes.

files.Title: Nautilus.FMod.FModMultiSounds
files.Summary: This class is used to register FMOD events with multiple sounds in one event.

files.Title: Nautilus.FMod.Interfaces.IFModSound
files.Summary: This interface is used to integrate with <xref href="Nautilus.Handlers.CustomSoundHandler" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.BiomeHandler.SkyReference
files.Summary: Defines a reference to a new or existing Sky prefab.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.BiomeHandler
files.Summary: A handler class for registering new biome types.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.ConsoleCommandsHandler
files.Summary: A handler class for registering your custom console commands.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.CoordinatedSpawnsHandler
files.Summary: A handler class for registering Coordinated Spawns.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.CraftDataHandler
files.Summary: A handler class for adding and editing crafted items.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.CraftTreeHandler.Paths
files.Summary: A list of all the built-in craft tree paths (AKA "steps to tab") for use in methods such as <xref href="Nautilus.Handlers.CraftTreeHandler.AddCraftingNode(CraftTree.Type%2cTechType%2cSystem.String%5b%5d)" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.CraftTreeHandler
files.Summary: A handler class for creating and modifying crafting trees.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.CustomSoundHandler
files.Summary: A handler class for adding and overriding Sounds. Also see the <xref href="Nautilus.Utility.AudioUtils" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> class.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.EnumBuilder<TEnum>
files.Summary: Represents a custom enum object. This class cannot be inherited.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.EnumExtensions
files.Summary: Extensions to interact more with custom enum objects.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.EnumHandler
files.Summary: Class responsible to resolve anything related to adding custom enum objects.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.ItemActionHandler
files.Summary: A handler class for registering custom actions when left clicking or middle clicking on an item.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.KnownTechHandler.DefaultUnlockData
files.Summary: References to generic unlock sounds and unlock messages for the Known Tech system, matching those used in the base game.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.KnownTechHandler
files.Summary: A handler class for configuring custom unlocking conditions for item blueprints.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.LanguageHandler
files.Summary: A handler class for adding or modifying language lines.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.LootDistributionHandler
files.Summary: A handler that manages the distribution of spawned resources throughout the world. Used for fish, items, outcrops, fragments, eggs, etc...

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.ModDatabankHandler.ModData
files.Summary: Data for the encyclopedia entry of your mod.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.ModDatabankHandler
files.Summary: A handler class for adding information about your mod to the "Mods" tab of the PDA's Datbabank. If you wish to add a standard PDA entry, instead see the <xref href="Nautilus.Handlers.PDAHandler" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> class.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.OptionsPanelHandler
files.Summary: A handler class for registering your custom in-game mod options.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.PDAHandler
files.Summary:
A handler class for various PDA-related purposes:
  • Registering log entries.
  • Registering encyclopedia (databank) entries.
  • Defining data for scanning fragments and other items.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.PrefabCollection
files.Summary: Represents a collection of <xref href="Nautilus.Assets.PrefabInfo" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> as keys and prefab factory as values.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.PrefabCollectionExtensions
files.Summary: Represents extension methods for the <xref href="Nautilus.Handlers.PrefabCollection" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> class.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.PrefabHandler
files.Summary: A handler for registering prefabs into the game.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.SaveDataHandler
files.Summary: A handler class for registering your <xref href="Nautilus.Json.SaveDataCache" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.SpawnInfo
files.Summary: A basic struct that provides enough info for the <xref href="Nautilus.Handlers.CoordinatedSpawnsHandler" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> System to function.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.SpriteHandler
files.Summary: A handler class for adding custom sprites into the game.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.StoryGoalHandler
files.Summary:
A handler class for interacting with all of the major goal systems in Subnautica, which are essential for the's game progression.

Allows for important game events to be triggered after a specified action is completed.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.SurvivalHandler
files.Summary: Handler class that relates to the <xref href="Survival" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> component. Allows the defining of oxygen or health gains when consuming specific items.

files.Title: Nautilus.Handlers.WorldEntityDatabaseHandler
files.Summary: A handler class for the <xref href="UWE.WorldEntityDatabase" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>. This class is essential for the game's Loot Distribution System to work properly.

files.Title: Nautilus.Json.Attributes.FileNameAttribute
files.Summary: Attribute used to specify a file name for use with a <xref href="Nautilus.Json.JsonFile" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.

files.Title: Nautilus.Json.ConfigFile
files.Summary: A simple implementation of <xref href="Nautilus.Json.Interfaces.IJsonFile" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> for use with config files.

files.Title: Nautilus.Json.ConfigFileAttribute
files.Summary: Attribute used to specify the filename and subfolder for a <xref href="Nautilus.Json.ConfigFile" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.

files.Title: Nautilus.Json.ConfigFileEventArgs
files.Summary: Contains basic information for a <xref href="Nautilus.Json.ConfigFile" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> event.

files.Title: Nautilus.Json.Converters.ColorConverter
files.Summary: A Color json converter that simplifies the Color to only r,g,b,a serialization.

files.Title: Nautilus.Json.Converters.CustomEnumConverter
files.Summary: An Enum json converter that supports custom enum conversions.

files.Title: Nautilus.Json.Converters.FloatConverter
files.Summary:
A <xref href="Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConverter" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> for rounding floats or doubles to a given number of decimal places,
trimming trailing 0s.

files.Title: Nautilus.Json.Converters.KeyCodeConverter
files.Summary: A <xref href="Newtonsoft.Json.JsonConverter" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> for handling <xref href="UnityEngine.KeyCode" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>s.

files.Title: Nautilus.Json.Converters.QuaternionConverter
files.Summary: A Quaternion json converter that simplifies the Vector3 to only x,y,z serialization.

files.Title: Nautilus.Json.Converters.Vector2Converter
files.Summary: A Vector2 json converter that simplifies the Vector2 to only x,y serialization.

files.Title: Nautilus.Json.Converters.Vector2IntConverter
files.Summary: A Vector2Int json converter that simplifies the Vector2Int to only x,y serialization.

files.Title: Nautilus.Json.Converters.Vector3Converter
files.Summary: A Vector3 json converter that simplifies the Vector3 to only x,y,z serialization.

files.Title: Nautilus.Json.Converters.Vector3IntConverter
files.Summary: A Vector3Int json converter that simplifies the Vector3Int to only x,y,z serialization.

files.Title: Nautilus.Json.Converters.Vector4Converter
files.Summary: A Vector4 json converter that simplifies the Vector4 to only x,y,z,w serialization.

files.Title: Nautilus.Json.ExtensionMethods.JsonExtensions
files.Summary: Extension methods for parsing objects as JSON data.

files.Title: Nautilus.Json.Interfaces.IJsonFile
files.Summary: A simple interface for a JSON file framework.

files.Title: Nautilus.Json.JsonFile
files.Summary: A simple abstract implementation of <xref href="Nautilus.Json.Interfaces.IJsonFile" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.

files.Title: Nautilus.Json.JsonFileEventArgs
files.Summary: Contains basic information for a <xref href="Nautilus.Json.JsonFile" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> event.

files.Title: Nautilus.Json.SaveDataCache
files.Summary: An abstract implementation of <xref href="Nautilus.Json.Interfaces.IJsonFile" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> intended for use with caching per-save data.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.Attributes.ButtonAttribute
files.Summary:
Attribute used to signify the decorated method should be represented in the mod's options menu
as a <xref href="Nautilus.Options.ModButtonOption" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.
When the button is clicked, the given method will run.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.Attributes.ChoiceAttribute
files.Summary:
Attribute used to signify the decorated member should be represented in the mod's options menu as a
<xref href="Nautilus.Options.ModChoiceOption%601" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>. Works for either <xref href="System.Int32" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> index-based, <xref href="System.String" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>-based, or
<xref href="System.Enum" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>-based members.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.Attributes.ColorPickerAttribute
files.Summary:
Attribute used to signify the decorated <xref href="UnityEngine.Color" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> should be represented in the mod's
option menu as a <xref href="Nautilus.Options.ModColorOption" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.Attributes.IgnoreMemberAttribute
files.Summary: Attribute used to signify the given property, field or method should be ignored when generating your mod options menu.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.Attributes.KeybindAttribute
files.Summary:
Attribute used to signify the decorated <xref href="UnityEngine.KeyCode" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> should be represented in the mod's
option menu as a <xref href="Nautilus.Options.ModKeybindOption" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.Attributes.MenuAttribute.LoadEvents
files.Summary: Specifies after which events the config file should be loaded from disk automatically.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.Attributes.MenuAttribute.Members
files.Summary: Specifies which members of the <xref href="Nautilus.Json.ConfigFile" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> will be parsed and added to the menu.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.Attributes.MenuAttribute.SaveEvents
files.Summary: Specifies after which events the config file should be saved to disk automatically.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.Attributes.MenuAttribute
files.Summary:
Attribute used to signify a <xref href="Nautilus.Options.ModOptions" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> menu should be automatically generated from a
<xref href="Nautilus.Json.ConfigFile" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>, as well as specifying options for handling the <xref href="Nautilus.Json.ConfigFile" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>
and <xref href="Nautilus.Options.ModOptions" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> menu.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.Attributes.ModOptionAttribute
files.Summary:
Abstract base attribute used to signify the decorated public member should generate a <xref href="Nautilus.Options.OptionItem" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>
in a mod's options menu.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.Attributes.ModOptionEventAttribute
files.Summary: Abstract base attribute used to signify a method to call whenever the derivative event is invoked for the decorated member.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.Attributes.OnChangeAttribute
files.Summary: Attribute used to signify a method to call whenever the decorated member's value changes.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.Attributes.OnGameObjectCreatedAttribute
files.Summary:
Attribute used to signify a method to call whenever the <xref href="UnityEngine.GameObject" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> for the 
<xref href="Nautilus.Options.OptionItem" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> corresponding to the decorated member is created.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.Attributes.SliderAttribute
files.Summary:
Attribute used to signify the specified <xref href="System.Single" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>, <xref href="System.Double" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> or <xref href="System.Int32" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> should be represented
in the mod's option menu as a <xref href="Nautilus.Options.ModSliderOption" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.Attributes.ToggleAttribute
files.Summary:
Attribute used to signify the decorated <xref href="System.Boolean" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> should be represented in the mod's
option menu as a <xref href="Nautilus.Options.ModToggleOption" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.ButtonClickedEventArgs
files.Summary: Contains all the information about a button click event.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.ChoiceChangedEventArgs<T>
files.Summary: Contains all the information about a choice changed event.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.ColorChangedEventArgs
files.Summary: Contains all the information about a color changed event.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.ConfigOptionEventArgs<T>
files.Summary: Interface for event arguments for a <xref href="Nautilus.Options.OptionItem" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.GameObjectCreatedEventArgs
files.Summary: Contains all the information about a created game object event

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.KeybindChangedEventArgs
files.Summary: Contains all the information about a keybind changed event.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.ModButtonOption
files.Summary: A mod option class for handling a button that can be clicked.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.ModChoiceOption<T>
files.Summary: A mod option class for handling an option that can select one item from a list of values.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.ModColorOption
files.Summary: A basic mod option class for handling an option that can be any <xref href="UnityEngine.Color" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.ModKeybindOption
files.Summary: A mod option class for handling an option that is a keybind.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.ModOption<T, E>
files.Summary: The common generic-typed abstract class to all mod options.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.ModOptions
files.Summary: Abstract class that provides the framework for your mod's in-game configuration options.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.ModSliderOption.SliderValue
files.Summary:
Component for customizing slider's value behaviour.
If you need more complex behaviour than just custom value format then you can inherit this component 
and add it to "Slider" game object in OnGameObjectCreated event (see <xref href="Nautilus.Options.ModSliderOption.AddToPanel(uGUI_TabbedControlsPanel%2cSystem.Int32)" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> for details on adding component)
You can override value converters <xref href="Nautilus.Options.ModSliderOption.SliderValue.ConvertToDisplayValue(System.Single)" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> and <xref href="Nautilus.Options.ModSliderOption.SliderValue.ConvertToSliderValue(System.Single)" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>,
in that case internal range for slider will be changed to [0.0f : 1.0f] and you can control displayed value with these converters
(also this value will be passed to <xref href="Nautilus.Options.ModOptions.OnChange%60%602(System.String%2c%60%600)" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> event)

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.ModSliderOption
files.Summary: A mod option class for handling an option that can have any floating point value between a minimum and maximum.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.ModToggleOption
files.Summary: A mod option class for handling an option that can be either ON or OFF.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.OptionEventArgs
files.Summary: Interface for event arguments for a <xref href="Nautilus.Options.OptionItem" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.OptionItem.ModOptionAdjust
files.Summary: The base 'adjuster' component to prevent UI elements overlapping

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.OptionItem
files.Summary: The common abstract class to all items in the mod options page.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.SliderChangedEventArgs
files.Summary: Contains all the information about a slider changed event.

files.Title: Nautilus.Options.ToggleChangedEventArgs
files.Summary: Contains all the information about a toggle changed event.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.AssetBundleLoadingUtils
files.Summary: Utilities related to loading Asset Bundles.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.AudioUtils.BusPaths
files.Summary: A list of the relevant FMOD bus paths the game uses.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.AudioUtils
files.Summary: Utilities pertaining to the use and creation of custom <xref href="FMOD.Sound" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> objects, alongside other audio-specific functionality. Also see the <xref href="Nautilus.Handlers.CustomSoundHandler" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref>.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.BasicText
files.Summary: Places a simple text object on the screen and keeps it there until either hidden (or a designated fade-to-black timer has passed). By default uses the same font/size/color as the "Press Any Button To Begin" message at the beginning of the game, and appears centered about 1/3 down the screen, but all parameters can be reconfigured.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.BiomeUtils.SkyPrefabFixer
files.Summary: Wrapper class that contains all Sky properties, which are automatically assigned. Necessary for our purposes because fields with SerializeField do not have their values saved when they are instantiated. Yes, everything HAS to be public!

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.BiomeUtils
files.Summary: Utility class containing methods related to creating custom biomes.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.ConstructableFlags
files.Summary: Defines how a constructable can be placed.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.FontUtils
files.Summary:
Contains references to frequently used Font Assets for use in the component, which is the preferred component for rendering text.

The fonts referenced in this class should not be expected to exist until after the Main Menu scene has been loaded and both the and components have been initialized.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.IOUtilities
files.Summary: Utilities for files and paths.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.ImageUtils
files.Summary: A collection of image loading utility methods that can create Unity objects from image files at runtime.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.ItemStorageHelper
files.Summary: A utility class that offers additional info about <xref href="ItemsContainer" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> instances.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.JsonUtils
files.Summary: A collection of utilities for interacting with JSON files.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.KeyCodeUtils
files.Summary: A collection of <xref href="UnityEngine.KeyCode" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> related utility methods.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.MaterialModifiers.ColorModifier
files.Summary: Basic material modifier that sets the <xref href="UnityEngine.Material.color" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> property on all materials.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.MaterialModifiers.DoubleSidedModifier
files.Summary: A material modifier that changes materials of the specified type to be double-sided.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.MaterialModifiers.FresnelModifier
files.Summary: A material modifier that changes the '_Fresnel' property of all materials.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.MaterialModifiers.GlowStrengthNightModifier
files.Summary: A material modifier that changes the glow strength of materials with options related to the time of day.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.MaterialModifiers.IgnoreParticleSystemsModifier
files.Summary: A simple material modifier that prevents materials on ParticleSystems from being converted to MarmosetUBER.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.MaterialModifiers.MaterialModifier
files.Summary: Base class for material modifiers. Can be overriden to implement custom behaviour.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.MaterialModifiers.WavingEffectModifier
files.Summary: A material modifier that enables a "waving" effect on all materials, commonly used for plants.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.MaterialUtils.MaterialType
files.Summary: Enum for some generic types of Materials.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.MaterialUtils.Shaders
files.Summary: Contains references to various Shaders.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.MaterialUtils
files.Summary: Utilities related to Materials and Shaders.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.ModMessages.BasicModMessageReader
files.Summary: Basic implementation of the abstract <xref href="Nautilus.Utility.ModMessages.ModMessageReader" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> that runs an action when a message with the given subject is received.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.ModMessages.ModInbox
files.Summary:
An object with an address. Receives mail and allows it to be read at any time. Any held messages (messages sent before this inbox was created) will not be read
until the <xref href="Nautilus.Utility.ModMessages.ModInbox.ReadAnyHeldMessages" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> method is called.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.ModMessages.ModMessage
files.Summary: An instance of a message that is either sent instantly or held until received.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.ModMessages.ModMessageReader
files.Summary: The base class of any object that receives mod messages and handles them.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.ModMessages.ModMessageSystem
files.Summary: A messaging system for cross-mod communication with <xref href="Nautilus.Utility.ModMessages.ModInbox" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> instances. Allows for ultra-soft dependencies and attempts to eliminate race conditions.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.PlayerPrefsExtra
files.Summary: A collection of utility methods that simplify calls into <xref href="UnityEngine.PlayerPrefs" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> for quick custom save data.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.PrefabUtils
files.Summary: A small collection of prefab related utilities.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.ReflectionHelper
files.Summary: An extension method class for simplifying reflection calls for improved readability.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.SaveUtils
files.Summary: A small collection of save data related utilities.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.SelfCheckingDictionary<K, V>
files.Summary:
This dictionary structure automatically checks for duplicate keys as they are being added to the collection.
Duplicate entries are logged and removed from the final collection.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.StorageHelperExtensions
files.Summary: Extension methods to provide static calls for <xref href="ItemsContainer" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> into <xref href="Nautilus.Utility.ItemStorageHelper" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> methods.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.ThunderkitUtilities.ApplyMaterialModification
files.Summary:
A MonoBehaviour component designed for Thunderkit which allows for user-friendly modification of material properties
on models within modded prefabs, directly from the Unity Editor. Can act either standalone or as a part of custom systems.

files.Title: Nautilus.Utility.WorldEntityInfoUtils
files.Summary: Utilities related to creating a <xref href="UWE.WorldEntityInfo" data-throw-if-not-resolved="false"></xref> instance.
